attributes.action: Bring down the minimum wage to allow to bring your loved ones to move to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Ones from a different country. But yet most people don't even earn that much in a year on a minimum wage working full time.
It would be different of it was someone else's spouse who works in Parliament so why should we suffer from bringing our loved ones to live with us in the beautiful country. It's not right and it's not fair considering that most people does not even get £18,600 a year from working full time unless you are a manager or MP.
This needs to be changed. And I hope it will
attributes.background:
We all have love ones who we want to spend our lives with, but sometimes we just can't because of people who work in Government makes it hard for British Citizensorry to bring over there loved ones
At the moment you need to be earning a minimum wage of £18,600 to be allowed to bring over your loved
